entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 4:30 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -14.9°C
Wind: WNW 24 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the evening then northeast 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
